arts.ttl: Arne Slot admits Liverpool's loss to Nottingham Forest is 'big setback'
arts.sum: "There were enough things we could improve from the Man United game, that’s also what we showed them. Liverpool head coach Arne Slot bemoaned his side's lack of chance creation in Saturday's 1-0 loss at home to Nottingham Forest.

arts.ttl: Alisson takes swipe at Nottingham Forest following shock win against Liverpool
arts.sum: A second-half goal from substitute Callum Hudson-Odoi was all that separated the two teams this weekend as Forest ran out surprise 1-0 winners at Anfield. Liverpool goalkeeper Alisson claimed his side "didn't deserve to lose" against Nottingham Forest on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot calls for instant response from his Liverpool team after shock loss to Nottingham Forest, as he admits first defeat of his Anfield reign is a 'big setback' for the Reds
arts.sum: LEWIS STEELE AT ANFIELD: Arne Slot has challenged his Liverpool side to show an instant reaction after the Reds fell to defeat against Nottingham Forest yesterday.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot points out four things Liverpool failed to do in Nottingham Forest defeat
arts.sum: Liverpool were beaten in the Premier League for the first time since Arne Slot took over as manager, with the Reds drawing a blank as they lost at home to Nottingham Forest

arts.ttl: Alan Shearer's two-word summary says it all after Liverpool lose to Nottingham Forest
arts.sum: Liverpool saw their perfect start to the season under Arne Slot come to an end with a shock home defeat to Nottingham Forest and Alan Shearer’s verdict of the result is sure to sting the Reds

arts.ttl: Liverpool 0-1 Nottingham Forest: Player ratings as Arne Slot suffers first defeat
arts.sum: However, the half-time break arrived with Liverpool having failed to find the breakthrough, and Forest deservedly level thanks to an impressive defensive effort. The Reds looked like they might be ready to spark into life after half-time when Mohamed Salah twisted and turned before forcing a save with a right-footed effort.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot frustrated as Alisson aims dig at Nottingham Forest after shock Liverpool loss
arts.sum: Reds fall to first defeat of the season surprising fashion

arts.ttl: Liverpool 0-1 Nottingham Forest PLAYER RATINGS: Who was beaten too easily for winner? Which of Arne Slot's stars had an afternoon to forget? And why the MOTM is destined for big move!
arts.sum: Liverpool suffered their first defeat under Arne Slot as they were beaten 1-0 at home by Nottingham Forest. Mail Sport's Lewis Steele assesses the best and worst performers from the clash at Anfield.

arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest ‘buzzing’ after breaking Anfield hoodoo with shock Liverpool win
arts.sum: Nottingham Forest shocked Liverpool on Saturday to pick up their first win at Anfield since 1969. The hosts created the vast majority of chances, but impact substitute Callum Hudson-Odoi scored the only goal of the game to keep their unbeaten start to the season intact. “We knew as subs we would come on at a […] The post Nottingham Forest ‘buzzing’ after breaking Anfield hoodoo with shock Liverpool win first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest stun Liverpool at Anfield to hand Arne Slot first defeat
arts.sum: Callum Hudson-Odoi came of the bench to score a wonderful winner.
